ModMetaData.name: unofficial patch - Elite Bionic Framework + Archotech Expanded Prosthetics
ModMetaData.author: Blake
ModMetaData.description: increases the maximum HP of all Archeotech prosthetics (vanilla + Archotech Expanded) by 50% (to the nearest multiple of 5, rounded up). Requires Elite Bionics Framework and Archotech Expanded Prosthetics (and must be loaded after both of them) credit to their respective authors
